The puzzles, combat, and scenarios are all too wondrous to describe in one sitting. Overall, I can say the developers of this jewel have really earned their keep.

Half life is undeniably one of the best, if not THE best, fps-titles ever released. I've played it through almost a thousand times and I've never grown tired of it. The gameplay itself is very engaging and the storyline is really something else. Besides the singleplayer campaign, the multiplayer aspect of the game is also a gem. You can spend hours on different servers where you engage in a fastpaced and action packed combat with other players. Remember: this game was published in '98! And people are still talking about it 22 years later. If you haven't already, I urge you to buy it.

Simply amazing.

I was born well after Half-life was released, so i only just played it. At first I expected the game to be only okay, and that it was simply overhyped and fogged with nostalgia. How mistaken I was. This game deserves every ounce of praises it receives, and I can understand why fans are looking for a third installment if this is what Valve is bringing to the table. The only slight nit-pick I have is the finale boss which was, to me, a bit of a bore. This small complaint can be easily overlooked though. 

9.8/10 Can't wait to play the rest of the series

Симулятор коровы на льду! Сюжет отсутствует 80% них не понятно что от тебя хотят и куда надо, в конце так полнейшая необъяснимая дичь. Геймплей трешь. В уродском дизайне уровней легко запутаться. Отвратная физика и непроходимость на тяж уровне, без читов не возможно пройти! Графика норм. Музыки нет. Это parasha не достойна считаться легендой, просто неплохая игра из детства не более. 4/10

О Халфе говорить много не требуется. Игра очень старая, но... Она легендарна. Она открыла новую эпоху игровой индустрии, совершенно отличаясь от игр, бывших до нее. Да, у первой части много неполадок, да, сейчас делают Блэк Мезу, да, можно посмотреть обзор и по сюжету так уж много вы не потеряете, но эту игру НАДО пройти. Даже если вы не фанат серии. В какой-то момент даже проникаешься этой атмосферой. Возможно, ремейк будет лучше по графике и в нем будут исправлены баги, но Халф Лайф есть Халф Лайф. 10 Хэдкрабов из 10

This 1998 Classic is still a very solid game and remains an exceptionally good game despite it's age. While it certaintly has aged and was definately a unique struggle to finish the game on my first playthrough, upon playing it a second time I realised just how much love had been put into this game and I settled into the Goldsource engine better. I personally reccomend anyone remotely interested in an amazing story such as this to give it a go. However if the thought of playing on the old Goldsource engine for such a long time is too much for you then don't fear because you can simply play the "Black Mesa" adaption of the game that was only just released this year by an independent company. Regardless of which way you choose to play the game it is an unforgettable story and well worth the 14-22 hours in game.

I never got into half life. Then one day on my brothers awful PC I decided to download it again and see if it would work. I don't know how or why but that play through made me love half life.  Honestly get this game and play it if you have not already.

Half-Life is one of the games that are in the select group that changes the gaming industry. Half-Life does not stand out "just" for defining the molds of the first-person shooter genre in post-Half-Life games, but it has, an absurdly fluid gameplay, a well-constructed thought-provoking narrative with realistic and supernatural elements that talk and make sense with the environment. This is one of those games that every video game fan, regardless of whether they like the fps or not, should play. The story goes through Half-Life and along with it comes incredible gameplay.

[quote=author] [b] Diğer oyunlar ile ilgili incelemelerime / indirim duyurularına ulaşmak için [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/37884261/] buraya [/url] tıklayın. [/b] [/quote]

Günümüzde hikayeli FPS oynayabiliyorsak bu oyuna borçluyuz. Bu oyuna artık bi inceleme yapmanın anlamı yok. Oyun tarihini kökünden değiştiren, FPS oyunlarına yeni bir boyut getiren, insanlara fizik profesörü sevdiren bir oyun.

Yıllarda kim ulan bu G-man dedirten bir oyun.

Gaben reyizin Steam platformunu kurmasının belkide ilk taşı.  Yıllarca ilmek ilmek işledikleri tarihin en iyi oyun hikayelerinden birisi belkide.

Oynamaya başladığınızda 1999 senesinde böyle bir oyunun nasıl yapılabildiğine akıl sır erdiremeyeceksiniz. Doğru düzgün hiç bir metin olmadan oyun size hikayesini anlatmaya başlayacak. Oyun bitecek internette kendinizi Black mesa'yı, g-man i araştırırken bulacaksınız.

Oynamayan kalmamıştır ( liseliler oynamamış olabilir) ancak ne yapın edin oynayın. Bi ihtimal source motoruyla yapılan Black Mesa'yı da oynayabilirsiniz tabi.

You know what this is, Its Half-Life. This game is so old but still holds up to today's standard of video games. It is a solid game, some problems, but then again this was made more than a decade ago. This game was remade a couple of years ago into a game called Black Mesa. But I like the original for its aged charm. Everything I was going to say has probably been said a thousand times by now, but I still give it a 7/10.

A timeless classic.
What makes Half Life truly a timeless game is simply its combat, which is also its best part. The enemies and weapons reinforce the importance of staying mobile and deadly, and it does it well with its fast movement speed, deadly enemies and (mostly) deadly weapons. 
The design of the areas and combat arenas of the game are, for the most part, superb, tying itself well to its form of combat. Besides its use in combat, the enviroments can convey a sense of danger in some areas, and wonder in others (near the end especially), and the storytelling through the level design in done well too.
The story is minimalistic at best, and near non-existance at worst. But, after you play through all of what this franchise has to offer, you can appreciate it much more. This doesnt mean they couldn't have tied more story threads into it, and it is something I wish there was more of.
The gameplay loop of killing things while running around like a maniac, then exploring, solving puzzles and finding supplies is really well done, and is easily what makes this game what it is.

It´s one of the all-time classic games. It´s pretty obvious that it can´t compare to games today but for everyone interested in a piece of what I would call "gaming-history" it is highly recommended to play this masterpiece. Just played through the whole game again the last few days and I was really suprised how much fun I had even after all this time.

Po wielu opiniach zasłyszanych o pierwszej części Half Life'a w końcu zdecydowałem się go przejść. Nie zawiodłem się. Gra świetnie tworzy klimat, przeciwnicy są zróżnicowani, broń ma odpowiedniego kopa, a zagadki, ze względu na swoją prostotę, nie spowalniają rozgrywki za bardzo. Jedyne, co trochę nastręczało mi trudności, to sposób w jaki Freeman się porusza. Albo biega jak sprinter, albo się wlecze. Dobra gra, polecam każdemu, kto lubi strzelanki

By God, I can see why this revolutionized the FPS genre. The way the story is told is just absolutely perfect. The art design; enemy design; just everything is just perfect. The HD models and textures are so well made compared to the original. This was perfect thing Valve made for first impressions. I just want to say that this game has aged wonderfully. I bet the newest of people would love this as much as the people who played it when it first came out.
